records.note_contesto: Shipwreck near Lampedusa involving a wooden boat with migrants. 7 bodies were recovered, and 9 people are considered missing. The boat sunk and cannot be retrieved. Approximately 62-63 persons were estimated to be on board.
records.evidenza_testuale: 7 people drowned and 9 people missing in shipwreck near Lampedusa. The death of seven persons and the disappearance of nine persons was a result of an accident.
